description:
Gold-Toothed Doctor is an old man who is in possession of his very own Philosopher`s Stone, as well as one of the few responsible for Wrath`s creation. He is privy to Amestris` top secrets and carries out Father`s orders in a ruthless fashion.
The Doctor is a short old man who has one golden tooth, short auburn hair, and moustache. He can normally be seen wearing a white lab coat along with his signature glasses. In numerous occasions, his eyes have also been shown to be disturbingly unfocused.
name: Kinba Isha
